content: *listen to the sounds of the sea with the sea songs conch shell yarnspirations * --- *skill level * easy --- **materials ** lily® sugar n cream® 70 9 g/2 5 oz 109 m/120 yds main color mc black 00002 or warm brown 01130 or hot orange 01628 or tangerine 01699 or hot green 01712 *1 ball or 50 yds/45 m* *additional materials * stuffing ---
